text: Belgian United Nations Contingent (BUNC) was the name for the Belgian and Luxembourger soldiers who volunteered to fight in the Korean War (1950â€“1953). ==References== Category:1950 establishments in Europe Category:1950 establishments in Asia Category:1950s establishments in Belgium Category:1950s establishments in South Korea Category:1955 disestablishments Category:1950s disestablishments in Europe Category:1950s disestablishments in Asia Category:Disestablishments in South Korea
